Title: upgrade Jessie to Jessie Backports
Description:
in this step packages will be upgraded to Jessie Backports (kernel, libreoffice, etc).

policykit-1 is the only package will (not) be upgraded from Jessie repo, because this will install systemd if you not use apt-preferences.

more: https://edpsblog.wordpress.com/2015/10/27/how-to-dist-upgrade-debian-wheezy-debian-jessie/
